mapper.insert:
select request_seq.nextval from dual
insert into request(REQUEST_NO, CATEGORY_NO, MEMBER_NO, NAME, FILENAME, EXPERT_NO, REQUEST_DESIGN_NO, REQUEST_DEVELOP_NO) values(#{requestNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{memberNo}, #{name}, #{filename}, #{expertNo}, #{requestDesignNo}, #{requestDevelopNo})

select REQUEST_DEVELOP_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into request_develop(REQUEST_DEVELOP_NO, PLATFORM, TYPE, CAREER, STEP, REFERENCE, DEADLINE, WORKTYPE, LOCATION1, LOCATION2) values(#{requestdevelopNo}, #{PLATFORM}, #{TYPE}, #{CAREER}, #{STEP}, #{REFERENCE}, #{DEADLINE}, #{WORKTYPE}, #{LOCATION1}, #{LOCATION2})

select REQUEST_DESIGN_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into request_design(REQUEST_DESIGN_NO, TYPE, RANGE, SCALE, DEADLINE, LOCATION1, LOCATION2, QUESTION) values(#{requestDesignNo}, #{TYPE}, #{RANGE}, #{SCALE}, #{DEADLINE}, #{LOCATION1}, #{LOCATION2}, #{QUESTION})
mapper.select: select f.*, r.expert_no,r.request_no, r.member_no, r.name, r.filename, r.request_design_no, r.request_develop_no, r.send_time, r.match, rd.* from field_detail f join request r on f.category_no=r.category_no join request_develop rd on r.request_develop_no=rd.request_develop_no where f.expert_no=#{expertNo} and (f.expert_no=r.expert_no or r.expert_no=0)
